channel.title: DealtX, A Revolution Rsps
channel.description:
Hey guys! Virus King here! Ive been coding a new server called DreadX. If you guys would like, you can join my Dev Team if your good! So far, my client looks like this:
[img]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/2682/rkaa.png[/img]
What i would like is if for some good coders out there in moparscape to offer me some help with my server! Im open for all of your guys ideas and you can code mostly everything you want to make the server good.
PEOPLE IN MY DEVELOPMENT TEAM! _______________________________
Pk Bowman (an excellent coder from PerfectionX) Star (an excellent coder from PerfectionX) Me (Im Alright) Flame_ helped me out a tiny bit
People i NEEEEEEEEED ___________________
A Hoster (if you host, you get Hoster Rank (owner with a diff crown) and you get ALL donations!!!!!!!! I REALLY need about 1 or 2 more coders that are good so they can help me throughout server. (Developer rank ingame with diff crown (java cup sign :D) A website designer and a GFX Designer. *Note* Depending on everyone who are in my dev team, we will code it for about a month until perfection before releasing. *Note*
Pictures of server right now _______________________
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7ZAeatE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/EuHrTRS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/9i4MMLd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/yq7Rr6P.png[/img] [img]http://img577.imageshack.us/img577/6581/z44e.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Q5RJUFo.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dqnaWqT.png[/img] [img]http://img203.imageshack.us/img203/3781/dhxd.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ajSZWYZ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/nQNtFDC.png[/img] [img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/9037/9b1j.png[/img] LOOOOOOOOOL I ROLLED AN 100! WOOOOOT [img]http://i.imgur.com/ysGqReI.png[/img] [img]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/4033/xvcp.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Fac8r4I.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wNHvfKA.png[/img] [img]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/2769/sfk8.png[/img]
Bad sides of server _________________
Possibly tons of glitches and bugs The files are pretty sloppy. The playerRights go up to 8. [VERY ANNOYING I KEEP THINKING ITS 3 AND I GET ULTRA DONOR) I had to paint the crowns (thats why they look shitty)
Good sides of server __________________ Magic is Perfected Melee is Perfected Range is Perfected ::give (playername) (rank)
[img]http://i.imgur.com/EBfqXC5.png[/img]
Ill keep updating on pictures of what ive done! Please please please guys, if you can, try to send me a pm here what you can be and we can decide! Thank you!
-John.

anyways gl

item.title: DealtX, A Revolution Rsps
item.dc:creator: @falconpunch777 falconpunch777
item.description:
@falconpunch777 wrote:

I think my stomach just imploded ten fold. This is Insidia X with a little Cache work. That client haha, what’d you use? Paint? Anyways, buy a vps if you ever want to go far.

item.title: DealtX, A Revolution Rsps
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

That server looks great xD

Nice to see someone using my source.

And you should make the crowns background pink, the client will read it as transparant, looks better then the ones you got now. Find another image in the cache, copy a part of it, paste it in a new paint, then use the colour picket to make it that colour.

Read full topic

Hey guys! Virus King here! Ive been coding a new server called DreadX. If you guys would like, you can join my Dev Team if your good! So far, my client looks like this:
